properties.description: Stg file list tablosuna containerdaki dosyaları insert eden pipeline

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	itemname as string (toString('CRFR_20210321.csv'))
}
source(output(
		dummy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 1 as dummy',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> dummy
dummy derive(itemname = $itemname) ~> itemname
itemname sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		DS_FILENAME = itemname
	)) ~> stgfilelist

parameters{
	itemname as string (toString('CRFR_20210321.csv'))
}
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		DT_FILE as date,
		DS_ENTITY_CODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhfilelist
source(output(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> stgfilelistsrc
stgfilelistsrc, dwhfilelist exists(stgfilelistsrc@DS_FILENAME == dwhfilelist@DS_FILENAME,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> notExists
AlterRow1 derive(ID_ISEXPECTED = 0,
		DS_EMAIL = 'ali.demir@obase.com') ~> idisexpected
notExists alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(DS_FILENAME)))) ~> AlterRow1
idisexpected sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DS_FILENAME'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> stgfilelisttrgt

parameters{
	p_stg_filename as string (STG_FILENAME)
}
source(output(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> transactionerrorlog
transactionerrorlog derive(STG_FILENAME = replace((replace(DS_FILENAME,'.xlsx','_err.csv')),'.xls','_err.csv')) ~> stgfilename
stgfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	rowUrlColumn:'STG_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE,
		ITEM_CODE,
		ITEM_BARCODE,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE,
		QUANTITY,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcsv

source(output(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY as string,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE as string,
		ID_ITEM_GROUP as string,
		ID_ITEM_CODE as string,
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_SOURCE_WAREHOUSE as string,
		ID_TARGET_WAREHOUSE as string,
		MT_QUANTITY as string,
		ID_UOM as string,
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT as string,
		ID_LPO as string,
		ID_SALES_ORDER as string,
		ID_DELIVERY_NOTE as string,
		ID_GRN as string,
		ID_INVOICE as string,
		ID_RETURN_NOTE as string,
		ID_CUSTOMS_STATEMENT as string,
		ID_REFERANCE_CODE as string,
		MT_INVOICE_COUNT as string,
		DS_TRANSACTION_REASON as string,
		SK_ID as string,
		STG_FILENAME as string,
		STG_FILETIME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY as string,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE as string,
		ID_ITEM_GROUP as string,
		ID_ITEM_CODE as string,
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_SOURCE_WAREHOUSE as string,
		ID_TARGET_WAREHOUSE as string,
		MT_QUANTITY as string,
		ID_UOM as string,
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT as string,
		ID_LPO as string,
		ID_SALES_ORDER as string,
		ID_DELIVERY_NOTE as string,
		ID_GRN as string,
		ID_INVOICE as string,
		ID_RETURN_NOTE as string,
		ID_CUSTOMS_STATEMENT as string,
		ID_REFERANCE_CODE as string,
		MT_INVOICE_COUNT as string,
		DS_TRANSACTION_REASON as string,
		SK_ID as string,
		STG_FILENAME as string,
		STG_FILETIME as string,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 exists(source1@SK_ID == source2@SK_ID
	&& source1@STG_FILENAME == source2@STG_FILENAME,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists1
NotExists1 derive(NewDate = coalesce(toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MM/dd/yyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyy/MM/dd'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'dd/MM/yyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MMddyyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyyddMM'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MMddyyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyy.MM.dd'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'dd.MM.yyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MM.dd.yyyy')),
		NewMTQuantitiy = replace(MT_QUANTITY,',','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY = NewDate,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
		ID_ITEM_GROUP,
		ID_ITEM_CODE,
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE,
		ID_ENTITY_CR,
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR,
		ID_SOURCE_WAREHOUSE,
		ID_TARGET_WAREHOUSE,
		MT_QUANTITY = NewMTQuantitiy,
		ID_UOM,
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
		ID_LPO,
		ID_SALES_ORDER,
		ID_DELIVERY_NOTE,
		ID_GRN,
		ID_INVOICE,
		ID_RETURN_NOTE,
		ID_CUSTOMS_STATEMENT,
		ID_REFERANCE_CODE,
		MT_INVOICE_COUNT,
		DS_TRANSACTION_REASON,
		SK_ID,
		STG_FILENAME,
		STG_FILETIME
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Main or Branch-رئيسى ام فرع} as string,
		{Company Name Arabic-اسم الشركة عربى} as string,
		{Company Name English-اسم الشركة انجليزى} as string,
		{Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى} as string,
		{Commercial License number-رقم االرخصة التجارية} as string,
		{Area-اسم المنطقة} as string,
		{Street Name-اسم الشارع} as string,
		{Area Number-رقم المنطقة} as string,
		{Street Number2-رقم الشارع} as string,
		{Building Number-رقم البناية} as string,
		{ Phone Number-رقم الهاتف الارضى} as string,
		{Fax-الفاكس} as string,
		{P.O. Box-صندوق البريد} as string,
		{Email-ايميل الشركة} as string,
		{Website-الموقع الالكترون} as string,
		{Map Location Url-الموقع على الخريطة } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputcompanycontainer
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
inputcompanycontainer select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(MainorBranch,CompanyNameArabic,CompanyNameEnglish),iifNull(CommercialRegistrationNo,CommercialLicensenumber,Area),iifNull(iifNull(StreetName,AreaNumber,StreetNumber2),
iifNull(BuildingNumber,PhoneNumber,Fax),iifNull(POBox,Email,Website))))!= true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MainorBranch,
		CompanyNameArabic,
		CompanyNameEnglish,
		CommercialRegistrationNo,
		CommercialLicensenumber,
		Area,
		StreetName,
		AreaNumber,
		StreetNumber2,
		BuildingNumber,
		PhoneNumber,
		Fax,
		{P.O.Box} = POBox,
		Email,
		Website,
		MapLocationUrl,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgCompany

parameters{
	fileName as string ('22071_Entity.xlsx')
}
source(output(
		{Seq-مسلسل} as string,
		{Name-الاسم} as string,
		{eMail- البريد الالكترونى} as string,
		{Phone-الهاتف} as string,
		{Extension-التحويلة} as string,
		{Mobile-الموبايل} as string,
		{Entity CR-رقم السجل التجارى} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputcontactcontainer
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
inputcontactcontainer select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(EntityCR,Name,eMail),iifNull(Phone,Extension,Mobile))) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SEQ as string,
		NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EXTENSION as string,
		MOBILE as string,
		ENTITYCR as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SEQ = Seq,
		NAME = Name,
		EMAIL = eMail,
		PHONE = Phone,
		EXTENSION = Extension,
		MOBILE = Mobile,
		ENTITYCR = EntityCR,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Item Code - رقم الصنف} as string,
		{Barcode - الباركود} as string,
		{Product Name Arabic - اسم الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Description Arabic - وصف الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Product Name English - اسم الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Description English - وصف الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Unit Item Barcode - الباركود للوحدة } as string,
		{No Of Unit Items - عدد الوحدات} as string,
		{Unit Weight/size - وزن/سعة الوحدة} as string,
		{Unit UOM - وحدة القياس} as string,
		{Package UOM - وحدة قياس الحزمة-التغليف} as string,
		{Cost Price - سعر التكلفة} as string,
		{Selling Price - سعر البيع} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark English - سم العلامة التجارية انجليزى} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark Arabic - اسم العلامة التجارية عربى} as string,
		{MoCI Product Group - المجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة} as string,
		{Country of Oragen Name - اسم بلد المنشأ} as string,
		{Country of Oragen ISO - كود 3 لبلد المنشأ} as string,
		{HS Code - رمز المنسق الجمركي} as string,
		{Supplier CR - رقم السجل التجارى للمورد} as string,
		{Supplier Name - اسم المورد} as string,
		{Category Level 1 - تصنيف السلعة 1} as string,
		{Category Level 2 - تصنيف السلعة 2} as string,
		{Category Level 3 - تصنيف السلعة 3} as string,
		{Category Level 4 - تصنيف السلعة 4} as string,
		{Width - العرض} as string,
		{Height - الطول} as string,
		{Depth - الارتفاع} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputitemscontainer
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
inputitemscontainer select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(iifNull(ItemCode , Barcode, ProductNameArabic) , iifNull(DescriptionArabic , ProductNameEnglish, DescriptionEnglish), iifNull(UnitItemBarcode , NoOfUnitItems, UnitWeightsize)),
iifNull(iifNull(UnitUOM , PackageUOM, CostPrice) , iifNull(SellingPrice , BrandTradeMarkEnglish, BrandTradeMarkArabic), iifNull(MoCIProductGroup , CountryofOragenName, CountryofOragenISO3)),
iifNull(iifNull(HSCode , SupplierCR, SupplierName) , iifNull(CategoryLevel11 , CategoryLevel22, CategoryLevel33), iifNull(CategoryLevel44 , Width, Height)))) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ITEMCODE = ItemCode,
		BARCODE = Barcode,
		PRODUCTNAMEARABIC = ProductNameArabic,
		DESCRIPTIONARABIC = DescriptionArabic,
		PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH = ProductNameEnglish,
		DESCRIPTIONENGLISH = DescriptionEnglish,
		UNITITEMBARCODE = UnitItemBarcode,
		NOOFUNITITEMS = NoOfUnitItems,
		UNITWEIGHTSIZE = UnitWeightsize,
		UNITUOM = UnitUOM,
		PACKAGEUOM = PackageUOM,
		COSTPRICE = CostPrice,
		SELLINGPRICE = SellingPrice,
		BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH = BrandTradeMarkEnglish,
		BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC = BrandTradeMarkArabic,
		MOCIPRODUCTGROUP = MoCIProductGroup,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME = CountryofOragenName,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENISO = CountryofOragenISO3,
		HSCODE = HSCode,
		SUPPLIERCR = SupplierCR,
		SUPPLIERNAME = SupplierName,
		CATEGORYLEVEL11 = CategoryLevel11,
		CATEGORYLEVEL12 = CategoryLevel22,
		CATEGORYLEVEL13 = CategoryLevel33,
		CATEGORYLEVEL14 = CategoryLevel44,
		WIDTH = Width,
		HEIGHT = Height,
		DEPTH = Depth,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgProducts

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Company CR #} as string,
		{Company Transaction Type Arabic } as string,
		{Company Transaction Type English } as string,
		{Company Transaction type} as string,
		{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['TransactionType','Archive']) ~> srcTransactionType
Select1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
srcTransactionType filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull({Company CR #} , {Company Transaction Type Arabic }, {Company Transaction Type English }), {Company Transaction type},{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types})) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		COMPANYCR = CompanyCR,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC = CompanyTransactionTypeArabic,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH = CompanyTransactionTypeEnglish,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE = CompanyTransactiontype,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES = PSMSMoCITransactionTypes,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgTransactionType

parameters{
	fileName as string ('a')
}
source(output(
		{Store Code-رقم المخزن} as string,
		{Entity Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Entity Commercial License No-رقم الرخصة التجارىة للشركة} as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى للمخزن} as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Commercial License No-رقم الرخصة التجارىة للمخزن} as string,
		{Warehouse/Store Code-رقم المخزن} as string,
		{Area Name-اسم المنطقة} as string,
		{St. Name-اسم الشارع } as string,
		{Area Code-رقم المنطقة} as string,
		{St. No-رقم الشارع} as string,
		{Building ID-رقم البناية } as string,
		{Map Location URL-الخريطه} as string,
		{Total Store Area M2-اجمالى المساحة متر مربع} as string,
		{Storage Capacity in TON-السعة التخزينية بالطن} as string,
		{Storage Type-نوع التخزين} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull(StoreCode,EntityCommercialRegistrationNo,EntityCommercialLicenseNo),iifNull(WarehouseStoreCommercialRegistrationNo,WarehouseStoreCommercialLicenseNo,WarehouseStoreCode),iifNull(iifNull(AreaName,StName,AreaCode),
iifNull(StNo,BuildingID,MapLocationURL),iifNull(TotalStoreAreaM2,StorageCapacityinTON,StorageType))))!= true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		STORECODE as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO as string,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE as string,
		AREANAME as string,
		STNAME as string,
		AREACODE as string,
		STNO as string,
		BUILDINGID as string,
		MAPLOCATIONURL as string,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 as string,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON as string,
		STORAGETYPE as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		STORECODE = StoreCode,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO = EntityCommercialRegistrationNo,
		ENTITYCOMMERCIALLICENSENO = EntityCommercialLicenseNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALREGISTRATIONNO = WarehouseStoreCommercialRegistrationNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECOMMERCIALLICENSENO = WarehouseStoreCommercialLicenseNo,
		WAREHOUSESTORECODE = WarehouseStoreCode,
		AREANAME = AreaName,
		STNAME = StName,
		AREACODE = AreaCode,
		STNO = StNo,
		BUILDINGID = BuildingID,
		MAPLOCATIONURL = MapLocationURL,
		TOTALSTOREAREAM2 = TotalStoreAreaM2,
		STORAGECAPACITYINTON = StorageCapacityinTON,
		STORAGETYPE = StorageType,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgWarehouse

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة} as string,
		{Item Code - كود الصنف} as string,
		{Item Barcode - باركود الصنف} as string,
		{Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر} as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن } as string,
		{Quantity - الكمية} as string,
		{Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك} as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي} as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 filter(isNull({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة }) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE = {Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة},
		ITEM_CODE = {Item Code - كود الصنف},
		ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode - باركود الصنف},
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR = {Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة},
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر},
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن },
		QUANTITY = {Quantity - الكمية},
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT = {Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -},
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO = {Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك},
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي},
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES = {Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك},
		ID_SK = SK_ID_SUR,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions

activities.name: GetFileList
activities.description: Get file list from processing container

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 1
FROM [dwh].[STG_CUSTOMS_DEC] as SCD
WHERE 
(
try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationSender], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(datetimeoffset,SWITCHOFFSET(cast(NULLIF([NotificationDate],'''') as datetimeoffset),''+03:00'')) IS NULL  
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([NotificationRef], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([bolNumber], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationNo], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationStatus], '''')) IS NULL
OR try_convert(nvarchar(200), NULLIF([declarationType], '''')) IS NULL
OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dwh.STG_CUSTOMS_ITEM AS SCI WHERE sci.declarationNo=SCD.declarationNo)
)
AND [NotificationRef] = ','''',activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.NotificationRef,'''')

properties.description: Update dwl file list table is expected column
